Articles.Content:
First off, Hello everyone! I've been playing since just before the release of 0.19, so please be gentle.

Now with all these awesome flags coming along nicely, of course I want to jump on the get-your-own-design-train, but I'm really horrible when it comes to thinking of a design and knowing what I want.

Also with beeing really sucky at photoshop and vector stuff I thought I'd capture some icons and shapes while at work instead, trying to make some flags to use later when I get home.

I've uploaded them into a foxy little dropbox folder,

Already resized and neatly stacked, ready to be dropped into the flag folder

( \ Kerbal Space Program \ GameData \ Squad \ Flags )

Dropbox folder

Also, here's a small sample;

You are all free to use them in anyway you like.

I might even upload some or all stock photos if things turns out better than expected.

Thoughts?
